Class Project_2

  • java.lang.Object
    • Project_2

  • public class Project_2
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      static boolean admin 
      static java.util.ArrayList<Booking> bookings 
      static java.util.ArrayList<Facility> currentFacilities 
      static int userID 
      static java.util.ArrayList<User> users

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Project_2() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addNewFacility()
      the addNewFacility() method allows for adding of new facilities with unique names, it calls the updateFiles() method to update the facilities file.
      static void checkAccounts()
      the checkAccounts() method shows the amount the user owns for his/her bookings, also allows the admin to see a users account statement.
      static boolean checkDate(java.lang.String date)
      the checkDate() method checks if the given date is valid by calling the validDate() method if it is valid it checks if it is on or after today.
      static void checkForRecommission()
      the checkForRecommission() method checks all facilities to see if they have to be recommissioned, and recommissions them if needed then it calls the updateFiles() method to update the facilities file.
      static void createUser()
      the createUser() method allows for creation of new user, it calls the generatePassword() method to generate a password, and calls the updateFiles() method to update the user file.
      static void decommission()
      the decommission() method allows for a facility to be decommissioned, it calls the checkDate() method to validate the date, and then calls the updateFiles() method to update the facilities file.
      static void deleteFacility()
      the deleteFacility() method allows for the deletion of a facility, it calls the updateFiles() method to update the facilities file.
      static java.lang.String generatePassword()
      the generatePassword() method generates and returns a string with random letters and numbers.
      static boolean loadFilesIntoMemory()
      the loadFilesIntoMemory() method loads files into three global ArrayLists.
      static boolean login()
      the login() method promts the user to login, it sets the userID and admin global variables
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      main() calls loadFilesIntoMemory() method and if it returns true it then calls the checkForRecommission() and updateBookings() methods to make sure the files are updated then it calls the login() method to let the user login, then depending on user type it shows a drop down menu for the user to select which method to call.
      static void makeBooking()
      the makeBooking() method allows the admin to make a new booking, it calls the slot() method to convert time to slot number, also calls the checkDate() method to validate the date, and updateFiles() method to update the bookings file.
      static void makePayment()
      the makePayment() method allows the admin to change the status of a booking to paid, it calls the payStat() method to show the options, and updateFiles() method to update bookings file.
      static boolean payStat()
      the payStat() method gives a choice if booking is paid or not.
      static void recommission()
      the recommission() method allows to recommission a decommissioned facility, it calls the updateFiles() method to update the facilities file.
      static int slots(java.lang.String input)
      the slots() method converts a time to a slot number.
      static void updateBookings()
      the updateBookings() method checks all bookings to see if they are all still valid, and removes any invalid ones and calls the updateFiles() method to update bookings file.
      static void updateFiles()
      the updateFiles() method updates all files with the current ArrayLists.
      static void updateFiles(int whichFile)
      the updateFiles(int whichFile) updates a specif file.
      static boolean validDate(java.lang.String date)
      the validDate() method checks if given string is a valid date and correct format.
      static void viewAvailabilityOfFacility()
      the viewAvailabilityOfFacility() method shows the avaible facilities for the given date or range of dates, it calls the validDate() method to validate the date.
      static void viewYourBookings()
      the viewYourBookings() method allows the user to view their bookings, and allows the admin to see the bookings on a given day or days in given range of dates, it calls the validDate() method to validate the given date.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        main() calls loadFilesIntoMemory() method and if it returns true it then calls the checkForRecommission() and updateBookings() methods to make sure the files are updated then it calls the login() method to let the user login, then depending on user type it shows a drop down menu for the user to select which method to call.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • login

        public static boolean login()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        the login() method promts the user to login, it sets the userID and admin global variables
        Returns:
        returns true if logged in successfully else returns false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • loadFilesIntoMemory

        public static boolean loadFilesIntoMemory()
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        the loadFilesIntoMemory() method loads files into three global ArrayLists.
        Returns:
        true if succesfull else false.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • updateFiles

        public static void updateFiles()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        the updateFiles() method updates all files with the current ArrayLists.

      • updateFiles

        public static void updateFiles(int whichFile)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        the updateFiles(int whichFile) updates a specif file.
        Parameters:
        whichFile - - specifies which file to update '1' for Users.txt, '2' for Facilities.txt, '3' for Bookings.txt
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                           throws java.io.IOException

      • viewYourBookings

        public static void viewYourBookings()
        the viewYourBookings() method allows the user to view their bookings, and allows the admin to see the bookings on a given day or days in given range of dates, it calls the validDate() method to validate the given date.

      • updateBookings

        public static void updateBookings()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        the updateBookings() method checks all bookings to see if they are all still valid, and removes any invalid ones and calls the updateFiles() method to update bookings file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • checkForRecommission

        public static void checkForRecommission()
                                 throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • validDate

        public static boolean validDate(java.lang.String date)
        the validDate() method checks if given string is a valid date and correct format.
        Parameters:
        date - - the date string to be tested/checked.
        Returns:
        true if given date is valid, false if invalid.

      • checkDate

        public static boolean checkDate(java.lang.String date)
        the checkDate() method checks if the given date is valid by calling the validDate() method if it is valid it checks if it is on or after today.
        Returns:
        true if given date is valid and is today's or after today's date, false if date is invalid or is before today's date

      • makePayment

        public static void makePayment()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        the makePayment() method allows the admin to change the status of a booking to paid, it calls the payStat() method to show the options, and updateFiles() method to update bookings file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • payStat

        public static boolean payStat()
        the payStat() method gives a choice if booking is paid or not.
        Returns:
        true if paid, false if unpaid

      • makeBooking

        public static void makeBooking()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        the makeBooking() method allows the admin to make a new booking, it calls the slot() method to convert time to slot number, also calls the checkDate() method to validate the date, and updateFiles() method to update the bookings file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • slots

        public static int slots(java.lang.String input)
        the slots() method converts a time to a slot number.
        Parameters:
        input - - time given as a string in the format hh:mm
